summary: This is an email chain from November 21, 2019, between U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman and other SDNY prosecutors discussing Jeffrey Epstein's New Mexico ranch. The email forwards a link to Daily Mail photos of the ranch and suggests subpoenaing Epstein's estate for surveillance footage.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Recipient and forwarder of an email discussing subpoenaing Epstein's estate for surveillance videos and pictures from his properties.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; his New Mexico ranch is discussed, and there is reference to him as a pedophile.

events.title: Email discussion about Epstein ranch evidence
events.description: U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman forwards an email discussing new photos of Jeffrey Epstein's New Mexico ranch and suggesting legal action to obtain surveillance footage from Epstein's estates.

keyFacts: Prosecutors were actively discussing obtaining evidence from Jeffrey Epstein's properties after his death.
The email specifically mentions subpoenaing Epstein's estate and executors for all videos and pictures from surveillance cameras.
The discussion references publicly available photos of Epstein's New Mexico ranch published by the Daily Mail.
The email shows ongoing investigative interest in Epstein's New Mexico property in November 2019.
